name: Etude
description:
Play as Etude Dirigentin a beautiful elven musicophile.

Use your mouse to draw gestures to match the notes appearing on the screen. Hit as many notes as you can in order to rise up the leaderboards.

***NOTE: Unfortunately there is a bug at the game over screen where the restart button doesn't appear making you stuck at the leaderboard screen***.

Links of pre-made assets used in this project:

Trick Style - DOVE SYNDROME 

PDollar Point-Cloud Gesture Recognizer - Da Viking Code
